Body:
I am trying to build a voice controlled robot where I send commands to stm32 and from it to esp8266. At the beginning I am trying to send the audio file as string encoded as flac at 8000Hz But I have two questions

  1. what is http url that I can add to it the API key ?
  2. How can reduce the memory used by micro controller especially the esp8266 ?

I have got code that sends the Json document as http. and waiting for response .

But that code works for geolocation API.
